means: 保持( maintain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentence.Network_en: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

sentence.Network_en: The married women of Shitamachi maintained the custom of blackening their teeth.
sentence.Network_cn: 下町的已婚女性还保留着把牙齿涂黑的习俗。

消防专业英语词汇表 ... main valve 主阀 Maintainability 维修性 Maintenance information management 维修信息管理.

entry.def: If you maintain something, you continue to have it, and do not let it stop or grow weaker.

example.ex: The Department maintains many close contacts with the chemical industry...
example.tran: 这个部门与化工行业保持着众多密切的联系。

example.ex: Push yourself to make friends and to maintain the friendships.
example.tran: 要求自己与人交友并保持友谊。

entry.def: If you say that someone maintains that something is true, you mean that they have stated their opinion strongly but not everyone agrees with them or believes them.

example.ex: He has maintained that the money was donated for international purposes...
example.tran: 他坚称这笔捐款将用于国际用途。

example.ex: Prosecutors maintain no deal was made...
example.tran: 原告坚持说不存在任何交易。

entry.tran: 保持，维持（在某一比率或水平上）
entry.def: If you maintain something at a particular rate or level, you keep it at that rate or level.

example.ex: The government was right to maintain interest rates at a high level.
example.tran: 政府维持高利率的做法是正确的。

example.ex: ...action is required to ensure standards are maintained at as high a level as possible.
example.tran: 要求采取行动确保标准维持在尽量高的水平上。

entry.def: If you maintain a road, building, vehicle, or machine, you keep it in good condition by regularly checking it and repairing it when necessary.

example.ex: ...a tough campaign to force authorities to maintain roads properly...
example.tran: 迫使当局妥善维修道路的艰难斗争

example.ex: The house costs a fortune to maintain...
example.tran: 维修这幢房子花销不菲。

entry.def: If you maintain someone, you provide them with money and other things that they need.

example.ex: He should pay and maintain you as well.
example.tran: 他得给你钱，还得供养你。

example.ex: ...the basic costs of maintaining a child.
example.tran: 抚养一个孩子的基本费用

means.word_mean: 3. continued in your keeping or use or memory;

Sentence.sentence: But chariots maintained their place in parades and triumphs right up until the end of the Roman Empire 1,500 years later.
It can be maintained among people of different age groups.
